title: Doha
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Doha, from a wide variety of genres like Arabic, Information, News, Religious and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as QBS Radio, Al Jazeera Audio - English, راديو اوريكس أف أم, إذاعة قطر, قطر اُردو ریڈیو and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

radio_info.short: QBS Radio is a broadcast radio station in Doha, Qatar, providing News, Talk and Entertainment. It is a service of the Qatar Foundation for Education,
radio_info.rest: Science and Research and Community Development and the QF Radio team is dedicated to capturing daily events, meeting important people, outlining developments and achievements.

radio_info.short: Radio Sawa FM 92.6 is a broadcast Radio station from Doha, Qatar, providing current events, sports and features on a wide variety of political and
radio_info.rest: social issues combined with an upbeat mix of the best Western and Arabic popular music. In addition to the latest headlines, RadioSawa.com also has reports on the latest news in technology, sports, business and the arts.
